Name: Wordle 4
About the game: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A TO Z. Hints of a new 'picture' format appeared in the game to simplify the game, the number of HINTs has been reduced up to 10. Added background music as well as new achievements. Good game!
